name: BulletEscape
description:
Input: 

- Mouse (fully optimized and reccomended)

- Keyboard

- Touchscreen (playable but not fully optimized not reccomended)

Game:

BulletEscape, is an action game where you have to dodge bullets, take upgrades and try to make the highest score. Increase your skill by playing in classic mode or push to the max in upgrade mode.

Try to do your best and have fun!
